CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests that property value being edited uses the user-specified color format.


Running: init

Running: editKeywordAsOriginal
1px solid red

Running: editKeywordAsHex
1px solid #f00

Running: editKeywordAsHSL
1px solid hsl(0, 100%, 50%)

Running: editKeywordAsRGB
1px solid rgb(255, 0, 0)

Running: editHexAsOriginal
#ffffee

Running: editHexAsHex
#ffe

Running: editHexAsHSL
hsl(60, 100%, 97%)

Running: editHexAsRGB
rgb(255, 255, 238)

Running: editNewProperty
hsl(120, 100%, 25%)
